bug.question: I’m little and slow, and carry my home on my back. What am I?
I can fly and have colorful wings. What am I?
I am a tiny worker, and I live in a hill. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am red with black spots.
🍀 People think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I jump very high and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to live in grassy fields.

bug.question: I buzz around flowers to collect nectar and make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I fly from flower to flower.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Little Miss Muffet sat on a tuffet...

bug.question: I light up at night with a gentle glow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 You can see me best at night.
✨ My light helps others find me.

bug.question: I can be green or brown, and hide in the leaves to not be found. What am I?
I live underground and make the soil better for plants. What am I?

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm small and yummy for bunnies!
🥗 You might eat me with salad dressing.

additionalData.funFact: Grass is one of the most abundant plants on Earth.

plant.question: I'm a color and also a plant with thorns. Ouch!

hints.text: 🎨 My name is also a color.
🌵 Be careful of my sharp parts!

additionalData.funFact: Roses have been cultivated for thousands of years.

plant.question: I grow tall and have a brown trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very, very big and strong!
🍁 I might lose my leaves in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.

additionalData.funFact: Trees help us breathe by producing oxygen.

plant.question: I am a juicy red fruit that grows on a vine. You can eat me in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🧺 You might have me at a picnic.
🚜 I grow on a long, green vine.

plant.question: I am yellow and have many petals. I turn my head to follow the sun. What am I?
I'm long and orange and rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

additionalData.funFact: Carrots were originally purple or white!

plant.question: I’m a big plant that gives us a yummy yellow fruit. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

additionalData.funFact: Bananas grow in bunches called hands!

plant.question: I'm a tall plant that has many kernels to eat and am used to make popcorn! What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can make something yummy with me.

additionalData.funFact: Popcorn is actually a type of corn!

plant.question: I am a green vegetable, shaped like a tiny tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like a tiny forest.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on trees. Squirrels love to hide me for winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am a type of seed.
🔨 You might need a tool to crack me open.

additionalData.funFact: Acorns are the fruit of the oak tree.
